AccountAccountRelation.name: AccountAccountRelation
AccountAccountRelation.description: Represents a relationship between accounts, such as a relationship between a          business account and a household account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this account account                       relationship.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship ends.

HierarchyType.description: Specifies the hierarchy between accounts that are related. For                       example, an account is related to another account as a parent,                       peer, or child.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the account is actively involved with the                       related account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view                       (<parmname>LastReferencedDate</parmname>) but not viewed                       it.

Name.description: Name of the account account relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedAccountId.description: The related account in the relationship.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the                       accounts.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship starts.

AccountContactRelation.name: AccountContactRelation
AccountContactRelation.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Account object for use in          Public Sector Solutions to represent information of members in a household

DataRollupCategories.description: Specifies the categories in which the data associated with a group                       is aggregated.

EndDate.description: The date a relationship between a contact and account ended. Use                       with the Start Date to keep a history of the relationship.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether relationship is active (true) or not                       (false).

IsDirect.description: Indicates whether relationship is direct (true) or not                       (false).

IsIncludedInGroup.description: Indicates whether the data of a group or a business account is                       included in the Household (true) or not (false).

IsPrimaryGroup.description: Indicates whether the group is a primary group for the member                       (yes) or not (no).

IsPrimaryMember.description: Indicates whether the member is a primary contact of a group                       (true) or not (false).

StartDate.description: The date a relationship between a contact and account began. Use                       with the End Date to keep a history of the relationship

ApplicationDecision.description: Specifies the decision for the application.

Comment.description: The information about the decision provided on the                       application.

DecisionAuthorityId.description: The user responsible for the application decision.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: Name of the preliminary application.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

PreliminaryApplicationRefId.description: The ID of the preliminary application reference.

ApplicationReview.name: ApplicationReview
ApplicationReview.description: Represents a review performed against a specified Individual        Application.

ApplicationCategory.description: Specifies the category of the application based on the decision period.

ApplicationId.description: The individual application associated with the application review.

ApplicationRecommendation.description: Specifies the reviewer's recommended outcome of the application.

ApplicationStageDefinitionId.description: The application stage definition that's associated with                                  the application review.

AssignedDate.description: The date when the application was assigned to the reviewer.

AssignedUserId.description: Identifies the user assigned to perform the review.

Comment.description: The information about the review provided on the application.

Condition.description: The condition that's applicable to an applicant.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which the application review shows on a                                  form.

DueDate.description: The last date by which the application review should be completed.

EndDate.description: The date when the application review was completed.

IsAssignedToMe.description: Indicates whether the application review is assigned to                                  the user who's logged in.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the application review is required                                  (true) or not (false).

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the application review has been submitted.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the application being reviewed.

OwnerId.description: The owner associated with this application review.

ReviewedById.description: The user who reviewed the application.

StartDate.description: The date when the application review started.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the application review.

SubmissionDate.description: The date when the applicant submitted the application.

Title.description: The descriptive name for the application review.

ApplicationCloseDate.description: The last date when  applicants can apply for a grant.

ApplicationOpenDate.description: The date when applicants can start to apply for a grant.

DecisionReleaseDate.description: The date when the application decision is announced.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: Name of the application timeline being reviewed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

Type.description: Specifies which feature this application timeline record belongs                       to.

BenefitSchedule.name: BenefitSchedule
BenefitSchedule.description: Represents information about the plan for delivering the          benefit.

BenefitId.description: The identifier of the benefit that's associated with the                       schedule.

DefaultBenefitQuantity.description: The default quantity of benefit that's provided within a session                       of benefit schedule.

Description.description: The description of the benefit schedule.

FirstSessionEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the first session ends in the benefit                       schedule.

FirstSessionStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the first session begins in the benefit                       schedule.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

MaximumParticipantCount.description: The maximum number of participants in a session.

Name.description: The name of the benefit schedule.

BenefitSession.name: BenefitSession
BenefitSession.description: Represents information about an instance of a planned benefit          delivery

AbsenteesCount.description: The total number of participants who didn't attend the benefit                       session.

AttendanceRate.description: The percentage of participants who attended the benefit session.                          The value of this field is calculated by a formula:                          (Attendees Count) / (Attendees Count + Absentees Count)

AttendeesCount.description: The total number of participants who attended a benefit                       session.

BenefitScheduleId.description: The identifier of the benefit schedule that's associated with the                       benefit session.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the benefit session.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the benefit session.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the benefit session record owner.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the benefit session.

Status.description: The status of the benefit session.

Budget.name: Budget
Budget.description: Tracks an estimate of future revenue or expenses during a specific          time period.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the budget.

Amount.description: The total amount of funds for a budget shown in currency                       format.

EstimatedUtilizationAmount.description: The amount that's estimated to be utilized from the budget.

Description.description: The description of the budget and its related business                       processes.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is                       available from API version 58.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: Name of the budget.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ParentBudgetId.description: ID of the associated parent budget.

PeriodEndDate.description: The end of the date range for which the budget applies.

PeriodName.description: The name of the time period to which the budget applies.

PeriodStartDate.description: The beginning of the date range for which the budget applies.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the budget.

Quantity.description: The quantity used to track a budget for non-currency projects. For                       example, this could be number of hours or number of resources.

Status.description: The status of the budget.

Type.description: Categorizes the budget by how it will be used.

UtilizedAmount.description: The amount that has already been utilized from the budget.

BudgetAllocation.name: BudgetAllocation
BudgetAllocation.description: Represents a subsection of a Budget that shows where allocated          resources are being applied.

Amount.description: The total amount of allocated funds.

BudgetCategoryValueId.description: The budget category value that's associated with the grants                       allocation.

BudgetId.description: The budget that this allocation is related to.

FundingDisbursementId.description: The funding disbursement associated with the budget                       allocation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: A descriptive name for the allocation.

Quantity.description: The total quantity amount allocated for non-currency                       projects.

Status.description: The status of the budget allocation.

BudgetCategory.name: BudgetCategory
BudgetCategory.description: Represents the purpose of the budget line item.

BudgetId.description: The parent budget that's associated with the budget category.

Description.description: The description of the budget category.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the budget category.

Reason.description: The reason why an item is being included in the budget.

SequenceNumber.description: The number assigned to a budget category that's used to edit or show a category.

BudgetCategoryValue.name: BudgetCategoryValue
BudgetCategoryValue.description: Captures budget values for category and time period.

ActualAmount.description: The actual amount of the budget that was used.

ActualQuantity.description: The actual quantity of the budget that was used.

Amount.description: The planned amount for the budget.

BudgetCategoryId.description: The ID that's associated with this budget category value.

BudgetDivisionId.description: The budget period that's associated with the budget category                       value.

Comments.description: The comments about how the budget was used.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of this budget category value.

Quantity.description: The planned quantity for the budget. Use when establishing budgets                       for non-currency projects.

VarianceAmount.description: The amount over or under the planned budget that was used.

VarianceQuantity.description: The quantity over or under the planned budget that was used.

BudgetParticipant.name: BudgetParticipant
BudgetParticipant.description: Represents information about a user or group of participants who have          access to a budget.

BudgetId.description: The budget associated with the budget participant.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the                       budget.

IsParticipantActive.description: Indicates whether the budget participant is currently active                          (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of the budget participant.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the budget.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the budget participant.

BudgetPeriod.name: BudgetPeriod
BudgetPeriod.description: Defines a distinct time interval in which the estimate applies.

BudgetId.description: The parent budget that's associated with the budget period.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is available from API version 59.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the budget period.

PeriodEndDate.description: The date when the budget period ends.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the budget period.

SequenceNumber.description: The order in which the budget period is shown.

CarePlan.name: CarePlan
CarePlan.description: Represents an instantiation of a care plan template for a particular          individual in order to reach specific goals.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the care plan.

CaseProceedingResultId.description: The outcome of a legal case for a participant.

ClaimId.description: The claim with which the care plan is associated.

Description.description: The description for the care plan record.

EndDate.description: The date until when the care plan is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan record.

ParticipantId.description: The account associated with the care plan.

StartDate.description: The date from when the care plan is effective.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the care plan.

TaskJobStatus.description: Specifies the status of the task in the task queue.

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: The message that describes the status of the task in the                       queue.

CarePlanTemplate.name: CarePlanTemplate
CarePlanTemplate.description: Represents the template for a type of care plan that can be offered for a          household scenario.

Description.description: The description of the care plan template record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the care plan template record owner.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the care plan template.

CarePlanTemplateBenefit.name: CarePlanTemplateBenefit
CarePlanTemplateBenefit.description: Represents a junction between a care plan template and a benefit. This object          stores the benefit details of a care plan.

BenefitId.description: The name of the care plan template benefit record.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan template                       benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template benefit record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the care plan template benefit.

CarePlanTemplateGoal.name: CarePlanTemplateGoal
CarePlanTemplateGoal.description: Represents a junction between a care plan template and a goal definition.          This object stores the goal details of a care plan template.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan template                       goal.

GoalDefinitionId.description: The goal definition associated with the care plan template                       goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template goal.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the care plan template goal.

CaseParticipant.name: CaseParticipant
CaseParticipant.description: Represents a junction between a case, and an account or a contact. This          object stores the details of the participant associated with a case. This participant could          be the applicant, co-applicant, a household, or even a business account.

AuthorizationProof.description: How the participant communicated their consent. This field is                       available in API version 58.0 and later.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the case participant record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the case participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the case participant record.

PreferredCallTimeFrom.description: The start of the preferred time window for contacting the                       participant. This field is available in API version 58.0 and                       later.

PreferredCallTimeTo.description: The end of the preferred time window for contacting the                       participant. This field is available in API version 58.0 and                       later.

PreferredCommunicationMode.description: How the participant prefers to receive messages. This field is                       available in API version 58.0 and later.

Role.description: Specifies the role of the case participant.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the case participant.

CaseProgram.name: CaseProgram
CaseProgram.description: Represents the junction between Case and Program objects.

CaseId.description: The identifer of the case that’s associated with the program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the case program.

ProgramId.description: The identifier of the program that’s associated with the                       case.

ComplaintCase.name: ComplaintCase
ComplaintCase.description: Represents the association between a public complaint and its corresponding case.

CaseId.description: The name of the case that is associated with the complaint.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The ID of the complaint being raised.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the complaint case record owner.

ComplaintParticipant.name: ComplaintParticipant
ComplaintParticipant.description: Represents a junction between a public complaint, and an account or a          contact. This object stores the details of the participant who registers a complaint with          the authorities. This participant could be the applicant, co-applicant, a household, or          even a business account.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the public                       complaint.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the participant's association with the public                       complaint is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not                       viewed.

Name.description: The name of the complaint participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the complaint participant                       record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the complaint participant                       record.

PublicComplaintId.description: The public complaint associated with the complaint participant                       record.

Role.description: Specifies the role of the complaint participant.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the complaint participant.

ContactId.description: ID of the account associated with this contact contact                       relationship.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship ends.

HierarchyType.description: Indicates the type of association to determine the hierarchy of                       relationship between the two parties.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the contact is actively involved with the                       related contact.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view                       (<parmname>LastReferencedDate</parmname>) but not viewed                       it.

Name.description: Name of the contact contact relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedContactId.description: The related contact in the relationship.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the                       contacts.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship starts.

FundingAward.name: FundingAward
FundingAward.description: Represents an award given to an individual or organization to facilitate a goal       related to the funder’s mission. This object is available in API version 57.0 and       later.

AwardNumber.description: The unique identifier of the funding award in the                                  customer's org.

AwardeeId.description: The entity related to the funding award. The account can                                  be an organization (business account) or individual                                  (person account) that receives the funding.

BudgetId.description: The budget that's used to track the use of the award                                  funding.

ContactId.description: The individual receiving the funding award.

ContractId.description: The contract associated with the funding award.

DecisionDate.description: The date and time of the decision about the funding                                  award.

EndDate.description: The date and time when the contract related to the award                                  ends.

FundingOpportunityId.description: The funding opportunity that's associated with the                                  award.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The individual application that's related to the                                  award.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a                                  record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                                  record.

Name.description: The name of the funding award.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ParentFundingAwardId.description: The parent funding award for this funding award.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the funding award.

StartDate.description: The date and time when the contract related to the award                                  begins.

Status.description: Specifies the current status of the award.

FundingAwardAmendment.name: FundingAwardAmendment
FundingAwardAmendment.description: Represents a modification to the scope or finances of a previously approved award.       This object is available in API version 57.0 and later.

AdjustedAwardAmount.description: The actual amount that's approved for adjustment in the                                  funding award amount.

AdjustedEndDate.description: The actual date of adjustment to the end date of the                                  funding award.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status of the requested                                  adjustment.

Comments.description: The comment about the approval or rejection of the                                  adjustment request.

ContractId.description: The amended contract related to this funding award                                  amendment.

FundingAwardId.description: The funding award that's associated with the contract                                  that's adjusted.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the amendment to the funding award has                                  been submitted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a                                  record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                                  record.

Name.description: The name of amendment for the funding award.

ProposedAwardAmount.description: The amount of adjustment requested in the award                                  amount.

ProposedEndDate.description: The requested change to the End Date of the funding                                  award.

Reason.description: The reason for the adjustment requested in the                                  contract.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the adjustment request.

FundingAwardRequirement.name: FundingAwardRequirement
FundingAwardRequirement.description: Represents a deliverable or milestone for a funding award or funding             disbursement. This object is available in API version 57.0 and later.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template that's related to the funding award requirement and that's used for funding requirement forms.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status the information that's                                  submitted against the requirements.

AssignedContactId.description: The contact who is responsible for submitting the                                  requirement.

AssignedUserId.description: The user who submits the funding requirement.

Description.description: The description of the funding requirement.

DueDate.description: The last date and time of submitting the                                  requirement.

FundingAwardId.description: Funding award that's associated with the funding                                  requirement.

FundingDisbursementId.description: The funding disbursement that's associated with the                                  requirement. The funds are disbursed only after the                                  requirements are fulfilled.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the requirement for the funding award                                  has been submitted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this                                  record indirectly, for example, through a list view or                                  related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.                                   If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view                                   indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the funding requirement.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the funding requirement.

SubmittedDate.description: The actual date and time when the requirement was                                  submitted.

Type.description: Specifies the type of funding requirement.

Amount.description: The total amount that's disbursed to the awardee.

DisbursementDate.description: The actual date and time of funds disbursement.

FundingAwardId.description: The funding award that's associated with the funding                       disbursement.

IsApproved.description: Indicates whether the funding disbursement is approved (true) or                       not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the funding disbursement.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

PaymentMethodType.description: Specifies the payment method for funds disbursement.

PaymentNumber.description: The unique identifier of the payment related to the funds                       disbursement.

ScheduledDate.description: The scheduled date and time to disburse the funds.

Status.description: Specifies the approval status of the funds disbursement.

FundingOpportunity.name: FundingOpportunity
FundingOpportunity.description: The pool of money available for distribution for a specific purpose. This object is       available in API version 57.0 and later.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template that represents the application sections                       for this funding opportunity.

ApplicationInstructions.description: The instructions on how to apply for the funding opportunity.

ApplicationTimelineId.description: The application timeline associated with the opportunity that                       describes the milestones in the application process.

BudgetTemplateId.description: The budget that's used as a template by the applicants when they                       apply for the funding opportunity.

Description.description: The description about the opportunity in terms of the minimum                       award requirements and expected outcome.

EndDate.description: The date and time when the acceptance of funding opportunity                       applications ended.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

MaximumFundingAmount.description: The maximum fund amount that's awarded.

MinimumFundingAmount.description: The minimum fund amount that's awarded.

Name.description: The name of the funding opportunity.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.s

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the funding opportunity.

StartDate.description: The date and time when the acceptance of funding opportunity                       applications started.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the funding opportunity.

GoalAssignment.name: GoalAssignment
GoalAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a goal.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the goal is completed.

CompletionPercentage.description: Indicates the progress made on the assigned goal in                       percentage.

CustomGoalName.description: A custom name that can be defined for the goal assignment. If this                       field is empty, the goal definition name is used for the goal                       assignment.

Description.description: The description of the goal assignment record.

GoalAssigneeId.description: The assigees associated with the goal assignment.

GoalDefinitionId.description: The goal definition associated with the goal assignment.

DescriptionCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the description of a                       standardized goal.

GoalType.description: Specifies if the goal applies to a group or an individual.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the goal assignment record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the goal assignment record owner.

ParentRecordId.description: The care plan or benefit assignment object associated with the                       goal assignment.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the goal assignment.

StartDate.description: The start date of the assigned goal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the assigned goal.

TargetCompletionDate.description: The date by when the assigned goal is targeted to be                       completed.

GoalDefinition.name: GoalDefinition
GoalDefinition.description: Represents a goal or a business objective that’s used as a reference.          When instantiated, GoalDefinition records create GoalAssignment records that serve as goals          in care plans.

Category.description: The category that the defined goal belongs to.

Description.description: The description of the defined goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view.

Name.description: The name of the goal definition record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this goal definition record.

ParentGoalId.description: The ID of the parent record.

Status.description: The status of the goal defintion.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the defined goal.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the defined goal.

IndividualApplication.name: IndividualApplication
IndividualApplication.description: Represents an application form submitted by an individual or          organization.

AccountId.description: The ID of the applicant’s account.

ApplicationCaseId.description: The ID of a case that relates to this application.

ApplicationChangeOverview.description: The Einstein-generated historical overview of the changes between                       application versions.

ApplicationName.description: Descriptive name for the application. This field is available if                       you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking in Setup.

ApplicationOverview.description: The Einstein-generated historical overview of application stages,                       data changes, and processing actions.

ApplicationReferenceNumber.description: The custom reference number assigned to the application. This                       field is available if you enabled Health Cloud, Public Sector                       Solutions, or Grantmaking in Setup.

AppliedDate.description: The date on which the application was received from the                       applicant.

ApprovedDate.description: The date on which the application was approved.

BudgetId.description: The budget associated with the individual application. This field                       is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking                       in Setup.

Category.description: The service category of the application.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the individual application.

Description.description: Text description provided by the applicant.

FundingOpportunityId.description: The funding opportunity associated with the individual                       application. This field is available if you enabled Public Sector                       Solutions or Grantmaking in Setup.

FundingRequestPurpose.description: Description of what the individual application funds are used for.                       This field is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or                       Grantmaking in Setup.

InternalStatus.description: Status of the individual application in Salesforce CRM.

IsOwnerEditable.description: Whether the owner ID of this record can be changed.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the individual application has been submitted.                       This field is available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or                       Grantmaking in Setup.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If                       this value is null, this record might only have been referenced                       (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The auto-generated unique ID for this application.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user that owns this record.

RecordTypeId.description: The record associated to the application.

RequestedAmount.description: Amount requested in the individual application. This field is                       available if you enabled Public Sector Solutions or Grantmaking in                       Setup.

RequirementsCompleteDate.description: The date when the applicant fulfilled all the requirements for                       approval.

SavedApplicationRefId.description: Reference Id of the saved application.

Status.description: The submission and approval status of the application.

WasReturned.description: Whether a submitted application was sent back to the applicant due                       to errors.

PartyPhilanthropicAssessment.name: PartyPhilanthropicAssessment
PartyPhilanthropicAssessment.description: Represents a formalized assessment of wealth when a rating takes place, such          as a third-party wealth assessment, a property valuation, a financial asset assessment, or          an internal assessment.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the assessment.

AssessmentType.description: The type of assessment, such as executive summary, donor brief, or                       third-party assessment.

AssetLiquidationValue.description: The value of the party's assets that can be liquidated within a                       specified time period.

AttributedUserId.description: The person the research is attributed to.

BusinessOwnershipValue.description: The value of private businesses owned by the party.

CaseId.description: The case that delivers the research.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the assessment.

ExtendedSummary.description: A detailed summary of the assessment.

GraduationCohort.description: The party's graduation cohort, if the party is a person.

GraduationStatus.description: The party's graduation status, if the party is a person.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the                       assessment.

OtherAssetsValue.description: The value of the party's assets not covered by other measures of                       net worth.

OtherNonprofitGiftAmount.description: The monetary value of the party's donations to other                       nonprofits.

OtherNonprofitGiftCount.description: The number of the party's donations to other nonprofits.

OverallRating.description: The overall rating determined by the assessment.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

PartyPhilanthropicRsrchPrflId.description: The research profile associated with the research.

RealEstateValue.description: The value of real estate owned by the party.

ResearchEndDate.description: The end date of the research, used to measure the research period                       and assess the efficiency of the research.

ResearchHours.description: The total hours spent on research for the assessment, used to                       track resource allocation and time spent on researching each                       prospect.

ResearchSharedDate.description: The date the completed research is shared with the relationship                       officer, used to ensure transparency and track the flow of                       information in prospect engagement.

ResearchStartDate.description: The start date of the research, used to create a timeline for the                       research process and track the duration of the research phase.

ResponsiblePersonId.description: The relationship officer assigned to the party.

ShortSummary.description: A short summary of the assessment.

StockValue.description: The value of public stock owned by the party.

StrengthsAndOpportunities.description: The strengths and opportunities identified in the assessment.

WeaknessesAndDrawbacks.description: The weaknesses and drawbacks identified in the assessment.

PartyPhilanthropicIndicator.name: PartyPhilanthropicIndicator
PartyPhilanthropicIndicator.description: Represents an unconfirmed or soft indication that highlights a person's          wealth or growth potential.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the indicator.

AttributedUserId.description: The person the research is attributed to.

CaseId.description: The case that delivers the research.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the indicator.

DateCollected.description: The date the information about the indicator was collected.

EstimatedValue.description: The estimated monetary value of the indicator.

Indicator.description: The indicator, such as donation history, net worth, volunteer                       hours, or inheritance.

IndicatorType.description: The type of indicator, such as engagement, wealth, philanthropy,                       communication, volunteerism, or media mention.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the party                       philanthropic indicator.

OtherSource.description: An indicator source that isn't a Salesforce object.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParticipantId.description: The person involved in collecting the research.

PartyPhilanthropicOccurrenceId.description: The prospect research event associated with the indicator.

PartyPhilanthropicRsrchPrflId.description: The research profile associated with the indicator.

RelatedOrganizationId.description: The organization involved in collecting the research.

ResearchEndDate.description: The end date of the research, used to measure the research period                       and assess the efficiency of the research.

ResearchHours.description: The total hours spent researching the indicator, used to track                       resource allocation and time spent on researching each                       prospect.

ResearchSharedDate.description: The date when the completed research is shared with the                       relationship officer, used to ensure transparency and track the                       flow of information in prospect engagement.

ResearchStartDate.description: The start date of the research, used to create a timeline for the                       research process and track the duration of the research phase.

SourceId.description: The business milestone, life event, or interaction summary                       associated with the indicator.

SourceType.description: The type of source, such as external interaction, internal data,                       third-party data, or public records.

Status.description: The status of the prospect research indicator, if it hasn't been                       verified as a party philanthropic occurrence.

PartyPhilanthropicMilestone.name: PartyPhilanthropicMilestone
PartyPhilanthropicMilestone.description: Represents philanthropic activities and financial status for a period of          time.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the milestone.

AssetLiquidationValue.description: The value of the party's assets that can be liquidated within a                       specified time period.

BusinessOwnershipValue.description: FIXME: Add the description here. [Writers: - The following                       description was added by the developer when they created this                       field. - It may nor may not be correct, complete, or up to date. -                       It is visible to customers in Setup > Object Manager in the UI. If                       you need to change what is visible there, ask the developer to                       change it.] The value of private businesses owned by the party.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the milestone.

ExtendedSummary.description: A detailed summary of the milestone.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the milestone.

OtherAssetsValue.description: The value of the party's assets not covered by other measures of                       net worth.

OtherNonprofitGiftAmount.description: The monetary value of the party's donations to other                       nonprofits.

OtherNonprofitGiftCount.description: The number of the party's donations to other nonprofits.

OverallRating.description: The overall rating of the milestone.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

PtyPhilanthropicAsmtCnt.description: The number of party philanthropic assessments within the milestone                       period.

PtyPhilanthropicIndCnt.description: The number of party philanthropic indicators within the milestone                       period.

PtyPhilanthropicOccrCnt.description: The number of party philanthropic occurrences within the milestone                       period.

RealEstateValue.description: The value of real estate owned by the party.

ResponsiblePersonId.description: The relationship officer assigned to the assessed party at the                       time the assessment milestone is generated.

ShortSummary.description: A short summary of the milestone.

StockValue.description: The value of public stock owned by the party.

StrengthsAndOpportunities.description: The strengths and opportunities identified in the milestone.

WeaknessesAndDrawbacks.description: The weaknesses and drawbacks identified in the milestone.

WealthAmount.description: The party's total wealth for the milestone.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the occurrence.

AttributedUserId.description: The user the research is attributed to.

CaseId.description: The case that delivers the research.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the occurrence.

DateCollected.description: The date the information about the occurrence was collected.

EstimatedValue.description: The estimated monetary value of the occurrence.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the party                       philanthropic occurrence.

OccurrenceType.description: The type of occurrence, such as donation history, net worth,                       volunteer hours, or inheritance.

OtherSource.description: An occurrence source that isn't a Salesforce record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant contact involved in collecting the research.

PartyPhilanthropicAssessmentId.description: The party philanthropic assessment associated with the                       occurrence.

PartyPhilanthropicRsrchPrflId.description: The research profile associated with the occurrence.

RelatedOrganizationId.description: The account of the organization that provided the occurrence.

ResearchEndDate.description: The end date of the research, used to measure the duration of the                       research period and assess the efficiency of the research.

ResearchHours.description: The total hours spent researching the occurrence, used to track                       resource allocation and time spent on researching each                       prospect.

ResearchSharedDate.description: The date when the completed research is shared with the                       relationship officer, used to ensure transparency and track the                       flow of information in prospect engagement.

ResearchStartDate.description: The start date of the research, used to create a timeline for the                       research process and track the duration of the research phase.

ResearchType.description: The classification of research for the occurrence.

SourceId.description: The business milestone, life event, or interaction summary                       associated wiith the occurrence.

SourceType.description: The type of source, such as external interaction, internal data,                       third-party data, or public records.

VerificationType.description: Specifies whether the occurrence is known or inferred.

PartyRelationshipGroup.name: PartyRelationshipGroup
PartyRelationshipGroup.description: Represents a group of people living together such as a household, or          a group of people affiliated with each other.

AccountId.description: The parent account associated with the party relationship                       group.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the party relationship group.

Description.description: The description of the party relationship group.

EndDate.description: The end date associated with the party relationship group.

GroupIncome.description: The total income of the party relationship group.

GroupSize.description: The number of active members associated with the party                       relationship group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the party relationship group.

PrimaryAddress.description: The primary address of the party relationship group.

PrimaryCity.description: The primary city of the party relationship group.

PrimaryCountry.description: The primary country of the party relationship group.

PrimaryGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically                       provides this value based on the party relationship group’s                       latitude and longitude coordinates.

PrimaryLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       party relationship group. Acceptable values are numbers between –90                       and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

PrimaryLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the party                       relationship group. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180 with up to 15 decimal places.

PrimaryPostalCode.description: The primary postal code of the party relationship group.

PrimaryState.description: The primary state of the party relationship group.

PrimaryStreet.description: The primary street of the party relationship group.

StartDate.description: The start date associated with the party relationship group.

Status.description: The status of the party relationship group.

Subtype.description: The subclassification of the party relationship group type.

Type.description: The type of the party relationship group.

PartyRoleRelation.name: PartyRoleRelation
PartyRoleRelation.description: Represents information about the type of relationship between the          participants.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not                       viewed.

Name.description: Name of the party role relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the                       roles.

RelatedRoleName.description: The role that's related to another role in the relationship.

RelationshipObjectName.description: The object that's associated with the relationship.

RoleName.description: The name of the role in the relationship.

ShouldCreaInversRoleAuto.description: Indicates whether a role record should be created automatically                       for the relationship (true) or not (false).

ApplicantId.description: ID of the applicant for the application.

BusinessAccountNameId.description: ID of the account related to the application.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the application was submitted.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: Name of the preliminary application.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

SavedApplicationUrl.description: Relative path of the saved application.

SubmissionDate.description: The date when the application was submitted.

Program.name: Program
Program.description: Represents information about the enrollment and disbursement of          benefits in a program.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template that's associated with the program.

ActiveEnrolleeCount.description: The count of program enrollees with IsActive                       on ProgramEnrollment selected. Data Processing Engine calculates                       this field if you activate the Program Management Data Processing                       Engine Definition templates in Setup. You can schedule this                       calculation to run on a regular basis.

AdditionalContext.description: The additional context about the program.

CurrentMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed in the current month. Data                       Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate the Program                       Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates in Setup.                       You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular basis.

CurrentYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed in the current year. Data                       Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate the Program                       Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates in Setup.                       You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular basis.

EndDate.description: The date when the program ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the program.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the object.

PreviousMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed in the previous month. Data                       Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate the Program                       Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates in Setup.                       You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular basis.

PreviousYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed in the previous year. Data                       Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate the Program                       Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates in Setup.                       You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular basis.

StartDate.description: The date when the program begins.

Status.description: The status of the program.

TotalEnrolleeCount.description: The total count of enrollees in the program. Data Processing                       Engine calculates this field if you activate the Program Management                       Data Processing Engine Definition templates in Setup. You can                       schedule this calculation to run on a regular basis.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the program.

ProgramEnrollment.name: ProgramEnrollment
ProgramEnrollment.description: Represents details of enrollment for benefits in a program.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account that’s associated with an individual or an                       organization enrolled in the program.

ApplicationDate.description: The date when the enrollee applied to the program.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact that’s associated with an individual                       enrolled in the program.

CurrentMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed to the enrollee in the current                       month. Data Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate                       the Program Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates                       in Setup. You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular                       basis.

CurrentYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed to the enrollee in the current                       year. Data Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate                       the Program Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates                       in Setup. You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular                       basis.

EndDate.description: The end date of the enrollment in the program.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the enrollment for the participant in the                       program is active (true) or                       not (false).

IsAnonymous.description: Indicates whether the participant enrolled to the program                       anonymously (true) or not                          (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the program enrollment record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the object.

PreviousMonthDisbCount.description: The count of benefit disbursed to the enrollee in the previous                       month. Data Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate                       the Program Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates                       in Setup. You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular                       basis.

PreviousYearDisbCount.description: The count of benefits disbursed to the enrollee in the previous                       year. Data Processing Engine calculates this field if you activate                       the Program Management Data Processing Engine Definition templates                       in Setup. You can schedule this calculation to run on a regular                       basis.

ProgramId.description: The identifier of the program that's associated with the                       enrollee.

SessionsAbsentCount.description: The total number of benefit sessions for the program that were                       scheduled for the participant but not attended.

SessionsAttendanceRate.description: The percentage of scheduled benefit sessions for the program that                       the participant attended.The value of this field is calculated                          by a formula: (Attended Sessions Count) / (Attended Sessions                          Count + Absent Sessions Count)

SessionsAttendedCount.description: The total number of benefit sessions for the program that were                       scheduled for and attended by the participant.

StartDate.description: The start date of the enrollment in the program.

Status.description: The enrollment status of the enrollee for the program.

PublicComplaint.name: PublicComplaint
PublicComplaint.description: Represents the complaints submitted by public users. This object is       available in API version 49.0 and later.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this complaint.

CauseSubtype.description: The subtype of complaint cause. This field is available in API version 58.0            and later.

CauseType.description: The type of complaint cause. This field is available in API version 58.0 and            later.

Comments.description: Additional details about the complaint. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

CompensationAmount.description: Any amount of money offered to resolve the complaint. This field is            available in API version 58.0 and later.

ComplaintCaseId.description: This field is deprecated as of API version 49.0.

ComplaintCaseStatus.description: The status of the related Case. This field is available in API version 58.0            and later.

ComplaintSummary.description: A summary of the complaint information.

EscalationCause.description: The reason the complaint was escalated. This field is available in API            version 58.0 and later.

IsComplainantAuthorized.description: Whether the person who filed the complaint is an authorized representative            of the Account. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date that a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date that a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the complaint.

OwnerId.description: ID of the complaint owner.

ProductType.description: The product that the complaint is about. This field is available in API            version 58.0 and later.

ReceivedDate.description: The date the complaint was received. This field is available in API version            58.0 and later.

ReporterAddress.description: Address of the reporter for further communication.

ReporterCategory.description: Role of the reporter in the organization.

ReporterOrganization.description: Organization that the reporter is part of.

ResolutionPriority.description: Indicates the priority for complaint resolution.

ShouldInclInRegulatoryRpt.description: Whether this complaint must be included in a regulatory report. This field            is available in API version 58.0 and later.

SourceType.description: The source of the complaint. This field is available in API version 58.0 and            later.

Status.description: Status of the complaint.

Subject.description: Subject of the complaint. This field is available in API version 51.0 and            later.

RecordAggregationResult.name: RecordAggregationResult
RecordAggregationResult.description: Represents a data aggregation from one record to another record based          on the record aggregation definition for the corresponding objects.

AggregateFromRecordId.description: The record from which data is aggregated.

AggregateToRecordId.description: The record to which data is aggregated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the record aggregation result.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this object.

RecordAggregationDefinitionId.description: The record aggregation definition for the data aggregation from                       the aggregate-from record to the aggregate-to record.

RecurrenceSchedule.name: RecurrenceSchedule
RecurrenceSchedule.description: Represents the recurrence schedule for a benefit schedule.

CompletedScheduleCount.description: The number of times the schedule was completed.

EndDate.description: The date when the schedule ends.

Name.description: The name of the recurrence schedule.

NextScheduleDateTime.description: The date and time when the schedule is executed next.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the object.

ProcessName.description: The name of the scheduling process that executes the request.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The related record for which you’re creating the recurrence                       schedule. For example, creating a recurrence schedule for a related                       Benefit Schedule entity.

ScheduleDayValue.description: The days in a week when the schedule is executed. This field                       contains a bit mask.                          Monday = 64                           Tuesday = 32                           Wednesday = 16                           Thursday = 8                           Friday = 4                           Saturday = 2                           Sunday = 1

ScheduleFrequency.description: Specifies the frequency at which the schedule is executed.

StartDate.description: The date when the schedule begins.

Status.description: The status of the schedule.

TotalRecurrencesCount.description: The number of times the schedule is executed.

Referral.name: Referral
Referral.description: Represents the information on client referrals in an          organization.

AuthorizationStatus.description: Specifies the authorization status of the referral for the                       associated provider. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the referral.

ClientEmail.description: The email address of the referred client.

ClientId.description: The account associated with the referred client.

ClientLanguage.description: The languages that the referred client speaks.

ClientName.description: The name of the referred client.

ClientPhone.description: The phone number of the referred client.

IsSelfReferred.description: Indicates whether the referral is made by the client.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view                       (<parmname>LastReferencedDate</parmname>) but not viewed                       it.

Name.description: Name of the referral.

OutboundSourceId.description: The source of an outbound referral.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

Priority.description: Indicates the priority of the referral.

ProgramId.description: The program that's associated with the referral.

ProviderEmail.description: The email address of the person or the organization that the                       client is being referred to.

ProviderFacilityId.description: The practitioner or provider facility associated with the                       referral.

ProviderId.description: The account or contact associated with the person or the                       organization that the client is being referred to.

ProviderName.description: The name of the person or the organization that the client is                       being referred to.

ProviderOrg.description: The organization that the client is being referred to.

ProviderPhone.description: The phone number of the person or the organization that the client                       is being referred to.

RecordTypeId.description: This field is a relationship field.

ReferralDate.description: The date on which the referral is received.

ReferralType.description: Specifies whether the referral is inbound or outbound.

ReferrerEmail.description: The email address of the person or the organization that referred                       the client.

ReferrerId.description: The account or contact associated with the person or the                       organization that referred the client.

ReferrerName.description: The name of the person or the organization that referred the                       client.

ReferrerOrg.description: The organization that referred the client.

ReferrerPhone.description: The phone number of the person or the organization that referred                       the client.

ResultCategory.description: Specifies the category of the referral result.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the referral.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage of the referral.

UnitOfMeasure.name: UnitOfMeasure
UnitOfMeasure.description: Represents the unit of measures for care metrics and care observations

Description.description: The description of this unit of measure.

ConversionFactor.description: The factor or rate that's used to convert this unit of measurement to the            base unit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this unit of measure.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Type.description: The type of the unit of measure. For example, weight, distance, period.

Sequence.description: The sequence number assigned to the unit of measure.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the unit of measure.

UnitCode.description: The code for this unit of measure. For example, mm[Hg], mcg/mL., kgs,            lbs.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The class associated with the unit of measurement.
